name: The Slapdown
description:
@FranklinsGhost

The Slapdown was made for the Pippin Barr Game Jam (2016) and came from the following game idea tweet by Pippin Barr:


░ ░ ░

░ ░ ░ ░ GAME IDEA

░ ░ ░ YOU HAVE TO FIGHT

░ ░ ░ ░ JUST TO BE HEARD

░ ░ ░


My interpretation of it was to use it as an internal argument between the different thoughts we have in our heads.

Just a quick game and dialogue needs to be fixed up and added to. Besides that I'm pretty happy with what I got done in the time I had.
